Now the <S%H9538>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>bodyguard<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H9567>calamity<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%>

and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H935>brought<s%> [it] on and <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as He <S%H1696>promised.<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> you [people] <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to His <S%H6963>voice,<s%> therefore <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> has <S%H1961>happened<s%> to you.

"But <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H6605>freeing<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%> from the <S%H246>chains<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are on your <S%H3027>hands.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you would <S%H2895>prefer<s%> <S%H5869><s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> with me to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> [along,] and I will <S%H7760>look<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> you; but <S%H518>if<s%> you would <S%H7489>prefer<s%> <S%H5869><s%> not to <S%H935>come<s%> with me to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H2308>never<s%> <S%H2308>mind.<s%> <S%H7200>Look,<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> you; <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H8033>wherever<s%> it seems <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> for you to <S%H1980>go.<s%>"

As Jeremiah was <S%H5750>still<s%> not <S%H7725>going<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> [he said,] <S%H7725>"Go<s%> on <S%H7725>back<s%> then to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has <S%H6485>appointed<s%> over the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3427>stay<s%> with him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> else <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H3605>anywhere<s%> it seems <S%H3477>right<s%> for you to <S%H1980>go.<s%>" So the <S%H9538>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>bodyguard<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a <S%H737>ration<s%> and a <S%H4864>gift<s%> and <S%H7971>let<s%> him <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> to <S%H9072>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> and <S%H3427>stayed<s%> with him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Now <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> they and their <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H6485>appointed<s%> <S%H9072>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%> and that he had <S%H6485>put<s%> him in <S%H6485>charge<s%> of the <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> and <S%H2945>children,<s%> those of the <S%H1803>poorest<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had not been <S%H1540>exiled<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

So they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> along with <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8576>Tanhumeth,<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5778>Ephai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> and <S%H3153>Jezaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H4602>Maacathite,<s%> [both] they and their <S%H376>men.<s%>

Then <S%H9072>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to them and to their <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Do not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H5647>serving<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> <S%H3427>stay<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> that it may <S%H3190>go<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> with you.

"Now as for me, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H3427>stay<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> [for you] <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to us; but as for you, <S%H622>gather<s%> in <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H7019>summer<s%> <S%H7019>fruit<s%> and <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> [them] in your [storage] <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> in your <S%H5892>cities<s%> that you have <S%H8610>taken<s%> <S%H8610>over.<s%>"

Likewise <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> and in <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> and <S%H834>who<s%> were in <S%H3605>all<s%> the [other] <S%H776>countries,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H5414>left<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant<s%> for <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and that he had <S%H6485>appointed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H9072>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4725>places<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> they had been <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H5080>away<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to <S%H9072>Gedaliah<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> in <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H7019>summer<s%> <S%H7019>fruit<s%> in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7235>abundance.<s%>

Now <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> that were in the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H9072>Gedaliah<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Are you <S%H3045>well<s%> <S%H3045>aware<s%> that <S%H1185>Baalis<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%> to <S%H5221>take<s%> your <S%H5315>life<s%>?" But <S%H9072>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> did not <S%H539>believe<s%> them.

Then <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H5643>secretly<s%> to <S%H9072>Gedaliah<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let me <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5221>kill<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5418>Nethaniah,<s%> and not a <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H3045>know!<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> should he <S%H5221>take<s%> your <S%H5315>life,<s%> so that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3063>Jews<s%> who are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> to you should be <S%H6327>scattered<s%> and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> perish?"

But <S%H9072>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> "Do not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> for you are <S%H1696>telling<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> <S%H413>about<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael.<s%>"
